N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 95.3 - Designation of fiscal officer

State Regulations
(a) The
director of manpower management is designated the fiscal officer, who shall
certify the payroll and respond to requests, in accordance with section
95.6
(b) of this

Part, for an itemized record setting forth the name, address, title and salary
of every officer or employee of the agency. (b) Either the chief executive officer or the
fiscal officer shall make the payroll items listed above available to any
person including bona fide members of the news media as required under section
88(1)(g), (1)(i), and (10) of the Freedom of Information Law. Notes
